name: BrownNoiseSoundMachineforSleep
0:
”Alexa, launch brown noise sound machine”
”Alexa, open brown noise sound machine”
”Alexa, start brown noise sound machine”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: brown noise sound machine
des:
Our beloved Brown Noise, trusted by over 100 million people from the #1 Sound Machine Podcast in the world - "12 Hour Sound Machines (no loops or fades)".

Brown Noise is a much deeper, fuller version of the popular White Noise, with a heavy emphasis on low-end frequencies. Its soothing, calming, constant tones are wonderful for helping adults and babies alike to fall and stay asleep, for study, for meditation, for managing anxiety, or for any other activities where you want to block out the world and focus solely on the task at hand. It also has incredible sound masking properties for use in distracting and noisy environments!

Enjoy the Sound Machine used by over 1.3 million people every week, and tune out the world for once!

[https://12hoursoundmachines.com](https://12hoursoundmachines.com/)

FYI we also have White Noise and Pink Noise Sound Machines if you prefer those! Look for the skills with this same logo but that say White Noise or Pink Noise instead of Brown Noise. Or, just say "Alexa, open White Noise Sound Machine" or "Alexa, open Pink Noise Sound Machine".

---

***HOW TO USE***

Enable this skill either by clicking the "enable" button above, or saying "Alexa, open Brown Noise Sound Machine".

By default, the Brown Noise Sound Machine will play until 1 hour time limit is reached (for the free version). To stop the Sound Machine before that say, "Alexa, stop.” To resume it again say, "Alexa, resume."

***SHOW YOUR SUPPORT:***

If this skill has been helpful for you, I'd be so grateful if you left a review! It actually helps a LOT to boost us on the Alexa Skill Store and makes it easier for others to find it too!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
